name: Break the G̵amè̢̢͘
detailed_description:
Hey, I'm Kevin,

I've been trapped here for 8259 days.
I don't know why, but someone is keeping me here.
I need someone from the outside.
You.

Yeah, I know what you're thinking;
"What's in it for me?"
I'm way ahead of you pal, I prepared a list of key features!

  • Character-rich story with focus on humor (Except if we meet Jeff, his humor is catastrophic.)
  • Complete customization of ALL abilities (Just don't remove my speech-ability.)
  • An utterly amazing companion (Yeah, that's me.)
  • A fun game (Just trust me on this.)
  • Choices you make change the story and interactions (Just do the right choices, OK?
  • Atmospheric 2D platformer
  • Cool stuff (There's some cool stuff in here. Yeah.)
  • And the cherry on top, I'll give you a free hat when I'm free.

I'll see you in the game.

- Kevin

The game is a sequel to Escape the Game, which is heavily influenced from games like Undertale, Thomas was Alone and various story-driven games were choices you make matter. Throughout the whole game, Kevin and other characters will constantly talk with you. Banter on choices you make or just talk about random pointless stuff. The game also includes a collection of abilities with a unique twist to them - to break the game's boundaries.

Can you help him break the game and free him?
I don't think so.

(Follow the development on twitter)
@Insanity_Games_

short_description: Kevin has been stuck in his game for 8259 days. Someone is keeping him in there. He wants to get out.

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 / Newer
  • Processor: Any
  • Memory: 1000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any
  • DirectX: Version 8.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: Not final
